title: What is your opinion about the Poco X3? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Poco X3 offers a FHD+ IPS LCD 120hz display with 240hz touch sampling. No other phone in this price range offers a display with 240hz touch sampling so this device would be pretty good for gaming. The Poco X3 also has a Snapdragon 732g which is just an overclocked version of the Snapdragon 730g in the Poco X2 but is still an upgrade. There is also a massive 6000mah battery powering the phone with 33W charging support (charger included in box) so this phone can easily last a day on moderate usage. The phone also has a 6.67inch display and weighs 225g which makes it very hard to use with one hand. The phone is also 10.1 mm thick. Coming to the cameras the Poco X3 features a 64MP Sony IMX 682 along with a 13MP ultrawide and a 2MP depth and macro sensor. The phone also has an IP 53 rating which gives the phone some resistance against water. The Poco X3 starts at 16999 onwards. According to me this is one of the best phones under 20000.
